data.eml:eml: Thraumata, a new genus from South America with description of a new species from Peru (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Goldstein, Paul Z., Zilli, Alberto (2019): Thraumata, a new genus from South America with description of a new species from Peru (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae). ZooKeys 867: 139-160, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.867.28728, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.867.28728
